body: do you know the reaason why there's more of this Yaoi doujinshi than Satoru X Kayo? that's because Satoru got CUCKED strongly by Kayo that's why Jap peeps are rarely wrote a doujinshi of those two and unlike Kayo the Killer acted more heroine like for waiting patiently on Satoru and Ironically he even helped in Satoru's hospitalization ,and helped cleaning his body (as shown in anime he is shaving the growing beard of Satoru)
